questions.questionText: What is the motto of the Indian Army?
questions.explanation: The motto of Indian Army is 'Service Before Self'

questions.questionText: Who is the head of the Indian Army?
questions.explanation: The Chief of Army Staff (COAS) is the head of the Indian Army

questions.questionText: What is the highest gallantry award in India during wartime?
questions.explanation: Param Vir Chakra (PVC) is the highest military decoration awarded for valor during wartime

questions.questionText: How many operational commands does the Indian Army have?
What is the highest peacetime gallantry award?
questions.explanation: Ashok Chakra is the highest peacetime military decoration

questions.questionText: Which special force is part of the Indian Army?
questions.explanation: Para Commandos (Parachute Regiment Special Forces) are the special forces of Indian Army

questions.questionText: What is the rank above Major General?
questions.explanation: Lieutenant General is the rank above Major General in the Indian Army

questions.questionText: Which is NOT an infantry regiment of Indian Army?
questions.explanation: Tank Regiment is part of Armoured Corps, not Infantry

questions.questionText: What is the second-highest wartime gallantry award?
questions.explanation: Maha Vir Chakra is the second-highest military decoration for wartime bravery

questions.questionText: Which is the highest JCO rank in Indian Army?
questions.explanation: Subedar Major is the highest Junior Commissioned Officer (JCO) rank
